display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=y9j5xmVwp-sQ7kNvwF6zQfM&_nc_oc=AdkfBdVyf1e9t2ErD3ApxOxcxvp_uIDdVHOMmbRpzUOWTGST1tLAKrMUSFvB2Y8m47k&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfunGIOT3l5IeMvzG8bn1q_g21Y9uSUNGt94pWTCqBodKQ&oe=698561AA)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=trjwS46mVEkQ7kNvwFI4tRl&_nc_oc=AdnqPwHpNe2xNOmDLLa2KC5mbhaOhFWQ6XqPzLtSMDKhQvBa7wCaNsujS_3IudPpN_o&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfvB94V4e3h0F_q2wFscmFORUDZUf5OTfoat5IOgw5Kvcw&oe=69855212)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5U4NOegHCbUQ7kNvwEuVBGP&_nc_oc=Adk7RBKc9o1jud79GqI5279XtDxnaJpSuvofsvuLgk3oHhpGE69f5DtmFuoNTQVma4A&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfvwjIzcsgfvaQQEQG5Lt_3fGyOlVp0ugvEwRJrkrJA6eQ&oe=698558ED)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hCJ81z0pRAgQ7kNvwF59lS3&_nc_oc=AdnyLnfGqijLNa6chzamnNq4kRHyOYVm0njtnSYM18JWKo8ViXWTLpHd7ItWHbEhiFM&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Aftxs5yeCI1fFHZZZDqUTt9YdXptpfTr7HipIoZPnGAa-A&oe=69856D50)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57566682_1730682357765277_5286327356836676334_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FX1m9wwqOicQ7kNvwE2DYiO&_nc_oc=AdlwEgHFIGdSJnKf7WG51WnBYL8cJbFKRjWuBhYbAh6ybAO86wtOD7P59_CXXWRGlk4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfsjebBA2f6elQM0HZLO6dOvIYuOEeOg8QNxpCGqQ0boFQ&oe=698561A3)
